name: test_ha
description:
arrange: deploy the chrony charm.
    act: request chrony_exporter metrics endpoint.
    assert: confirm that metrics are scraped.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: deploy the chrony charm.
act: request chrony_exporter metrics endpoint.
assert: confirm that metrics are scraped.
